short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start a new mite tracker simply from any GitHub or GitLab issue or pull/merge request page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple one click extension: You can start a new mite tracker simply from any GitHub or GitLab issue page. You can also select a project and service for each repository if you like. That setting will be remembered for the next use. The default issue note contains the issue number, description and a link. Example: '#423 Refactor image uploader http://github.com/example/example/issues/123'
